title: Personal Portfolio & Blog
summary: A modern web application built with React and .NET, featuring a personal blog, project showcase, and custom CMS. Implements a clean, responsive design with dynamic content management and tag-based navigation.
features: Custom blog system with tag-based navigation,Project portfolio with filterable showcase,Responsive design with dark theme,Full-stack implementation with .NET backend,Content management system for blog posts
description: A personal portfolio website that serves as both a project showcase and blogging platform. Built with React for the frontend, utilizing Tailwind CSS for styling, and backed by a .NET API with SQL Server database. Features include a custom blog system with tag filtering, project showcase, and responsive design optimized for all devices.
